About this project

For this project I learned plush which is a templating engine used by the buffalo a Go webdevelopment eco-system and Sass. I created a custom auto-complete searchbar using jquery and SASS. I also collaborated with other developers on using a backend call to retrieve data for the searchbar as well as getting my code reviewed using github pull requests.

Technical Sheet

Core technologies I used to on this website:

  • javascript
  • jquery
  • Sass
  • Plush
  • Github
